title: Advanced JavaScript
description: Master advanced JavaScript concepts including closures, prototypes, async/await, and functional programming paradigms. Learn to write clean, efficient, and maintainable code for modern web applications.

title: React Native Development
description: Build cross-platform mobile applications using React Native. Learn to create native-like UIs, implement navigation, manage state, and integrate with device features and APIs.

title: Data Visualization with D3.js
description: Learn to create interactive and dynamic data visualizations using D3.js. Master SVG manipulation, scales, axes, transitions, and interactive charts to effectively communicate complex data.

title: UI/UX Design Principles
description: Learn fundamental UI/UX design principles and best practices. Understand user research, wireframing, prototyping, usability testing, and how to create intuitive and accessible user interfaces.

title: GraphQL API Development
description: Master GraphQL for building efficient and flexible APIs. Learn schema design, resolvers, mutations, subscriptions, and how to integrate GraphQL with various databases and authentication systems.

title: Docker and Containerization
description: Learn Docker fundamentals and containerization concepts. Master creating Dockerfiles, managing images and containers, setting up multi-container applications with Docker Compose, and container orchestration basics.

title: Machine Learning Fundamentals
description: Introduction to machine learning concepts and algorithms. Learn about supervised and unsupervised learning, model evaluation, feature engineering, and implement basic ML algorithms using Python and scikit-learn.

title: Cybersecurity Basics
description: Learn fundamental cybersecurity concepts and best practices. Understand common threats, vulnerabilities, encryption, authentication, secure coding practices, and basic penetration testing techniques.

title: Blockchain Development
description: Master blockchain development concepts and techniques. Learn about distributed ledger technology, smart contracts, decentralized applications (DApps), and how to build on platforms like Ethereum using Solidity.

title: Cloud Architecture with AWS
description: Learn to design and implement scalable, reliable, and secure cloud solutions using AWS services. Master EC2, S3, RDS, Lambda, API Gateway, and best practices for cloud architecture and deployment.
